TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AnsiLogConsole extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Internal.IConsole

Docs.summary: Log console for non-Windows platform consoles that understand the ANSI escape-code sequences to represent color.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
This API supports the .NET infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
